captions.text: Your poor heart, so weak‪,‬ it can‪'‬t bear
Hardship and dispute,‬ No it can‪'‬t bear it
Your pure human nature calls out to you whatever happens
Forgive‪, pardon, you're the winner and tomorrow you'll reap the reward
Forgive and coexist to be elevated
So we may grow into a stronger society
We argue and we differ‪,‬ but we don't hold a grudge
Our humanity calls on us to communicate
If you cannot agree‪, accept it‪
Forgive‪,‬ pardon‪,‬ you‪'‬re the winner and tomorrow you‪'‬ll reap the reward
Forgive and coexist to be elevated
So we may grow into a stronger society
Be a charitable hand that reaches out
And a guide who finds joy in love
Inspire forgiveness and make it be heard
Forgive and coexist to be elevated
So we may grow into a stronger society
